newsitem.title: JAPAN: Konami says its finance firm to start up Dec 10.
newsitem.headline: Konami says its finance firm to start up Dec 10.

text.p: Japanese game machine maker Konami Co Ltd said on Wednesday that a finance firm it set up earlier this year would start operating from December 10 after obtaining permission from the Tokyo metropolitan government.
The new firm was set up in October to procure funds necessary for expanding the Konami group's business, the company said in a statement.
The finance firm, capitalised at 50 million yen, will procure funds by bank loans and issuing commercial paper and bonds, the statement said.
